content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [silver].[inventory_snapshot]
( 
	[ProductID] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[WarehouseID] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[Quantity] [int]  NULL,
	[LastStockedDate] [date]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
